## Configuration.features property

Features to enable

Signature:

```typescript
features: {
        cache?: boolean;
        dashboard?: boolean;
        clean?: boolean;
        hash?: boolean;
        html?: boolean;
        inject?: boolean;
        install?: boolean;
        log?: boolean;
        manifest?: boolean;
        runtimeChunk?: boolean;
        splitChunks?: boolean;
    };
```
